title: Projects
text:
Led time series and regression analysis on residential real estate data to identify sales trends and predict price movements.



Mapped out operational bottlenecks, proposed process optimizations, and modeled improvement strategies in a detailed management report.



Explored consumer behavior, product pricing, and seasonal trends in the beauty industry. Currently building a dashboard to visualize key insights.



Compared job trends across industries. Visualized results in an AWS-hosted dashboard showing the AI-driven job boom.

title: Vidhi A. Sharma
text:
Hi, I‚Äôm Vidhi Sharma, currently pursuing my Master‚Äôs in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University. With a background in Computer Science and hands-on experience in analytics, operations, and business strategy, I specialize in turning messy data into crystal-clear action.
I‚Äôve worked across a range of industries and tools, from streamlining backend workflows to building dashboards for non-technical decision-makers. My superpower is blending logic with creative clarity ‚Äî turning technical insights into strategic action.

title: Vidhi A. Sharma
text:
Programming, Analytics & Data Science

Proficient in Python, R, SQL, Java, C++, and Shell Scripting. Skilled in OOP, algorithms, time series, segmentation, clustering, A/B testing. Libraries: pandas, scikit-learn, statsmodels, ggplot2, caret.

title: Vidhi A. Sharma
text:
Data Visualization, BI & Automation

Power BI, Tableau, Excel, SAS. Dashboard design, user-centered storytelling, filters, DAX. Automated ETL and reporting using Python. Familiar with Dataiku for low-code ML.

title: Vidhi A. Sharma
text:
Databases, Cloud & DevOps

Worked with PostgreSQL, MySQL, BigQuery, Spark SQL. Deployed solutions on AWS (S3, EC2, SageMaker), Azure. Built ETL pipelines, familiar with Airflow. Strong Git/GitHub skills.

title: Vidhi A. Sharma
text:
Web and Full-Stack Development

HTML, CSS, JavaScript, GitHub Pages. Projects built with Quarto, Markdown, YAML, JSON. Familiar with frontend architecture and web delivery for data storytelling.

title: Vidhi A. Sharma
text:

Excellent communicator (written, visual, verbal). Detail-oriented, adaptable, structured problem solver. Team collaborator who thrives independently. Stakeholder-facing and results-driven.
